name: b3Intelligence
overview:
b3Intelligence is one of the fastest rising service providers in the Indian KPO market and works closely with Market Research Companies based in the US and Canada. The organization excels in the domains like market research, finance and business research and pharmaceutical research. It provides extensive and highly simple reports in all of them, ensuring clients get the information they need in a structured manner.

In a very short span of time, B3Intelligence has steadily risen to become a major player in the Indian KPO sector and has drawn a lot of praise for its good work. The success can be attributed to the wonderful roster the organization boasts of, which has the likes of finance professionals, engineers, qualified economists etc.

In case you want reports on the latest markets regarding your business, touch base with B3I right away.
